```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse); library(vroom); library(janitor)
```


```{r, message = F}
philly <- vroom("../data/phl_data.csv")
glimpse(philly)
```

```{r}
philly2 <- philly %>% 
  mutate(ctyfips = str_sub(FIPStract, 1, 5))

philly2$ctyfips %>% unique()
```
